meanings.definition: A public event at which stunt flying, skydiving, and other aerial displays are performed.
meanings.sent1: The airshows featured amazing stunts and skydiving performances.
meanings.sent2: I love attending airshows to watch the exciting aerial displays.
meanings.sent3: At the airshow, the skydivers accidentally landed in the wrong place!
meanings.sent4: Her dance in the sky was like a beautiful airshow for the birds.
meanings.sent5: The airshow was so thrilling that it felt like I was flying alongside them.

meanings.sent1: The pilots will airshows this weekend with their incredible flying skills.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to airshows for the first time in front of a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally airshows during practice and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her performance at the airshow was so mesmerizing that the audience was captivated.
meanings.sent5: They practiced for weeks to airshows perfectly and impress the spectators.
